data.text: SPOTAPOD: YOU CAN'T HANDLE THE TRUTH *** WARNING, THIS POST WILL USE PODS *** Lara Sophie Bothur I'm really curious to find out how you would explain this rise of connections/followers in one day. Yeah, I'm the guy who called you out last November for gaming LinkedIn and also helped t3n magazine with their research https://lnkd.in/eJUuj5Tx Subscribe to my monthly newsletter https://lnkd.in/eAJ8meaH to get the juice on who's gaming LinkedIn. A special thanks to Joel Lalgee for asking me to include his numbers in the mix. Joel is clocking between 40-60 new followers/connections a day and has 247K followers. Joel is a real authentic OG of this platform. Subscribe to get a copy of this spreadsheet when the first edition of my newsletter comes out on August 31, 2024. Want early access to the spreadsheet, subscribe and buy me a coffee using this link https://lnkd.in/gWzJTxU3 - The money will surely help with my research. LinkedIn recommendations also goes a long way. Feel free to DM me. Be Real Authentic and Never Duplicate and please follow my #braand #spotapod #unpod EDIT: I'm tracking these creators on my own, this spreadsheet does not mean these people are in pods. I'm only shedding light on follower counts as I believe some may be buying followers. I promise you will ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ at the comments. *** WARNING, THIS POST WILL USE PODS ***
